text: Robert Wallace (born 1905) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as an inside forward for Cowdenbeath, Sunderland and Third Lanark.Robert Wallace, TheStatCat ==References== Category:1905 births Category:Sportspeople from Paisley, Renfrewshire Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football inside forwards Category:Cambuslang Rangers F.C. players Category:Cowdenbeath F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Third Lanark A.C. players Category:Bo'ness F.C. players Category:Raleigh Athletic F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Scottish Junior Football Association players Category:Scottish Football League players Category:Year of death missing
